nodes.text: Shon was a female Human who was one of the Sith Lord Shalath's five Sith apprentices during the Cold War. Shon and the others were sent to use Sith runes in a ritual to bind a Sithspawn, but they were killed by Dromund Kaas's wildlife before they could complete the ritual. She carried the Rune of Strength.
